Package org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.quartz

Interface Summary
GrailsTaskClass Represents a task class in Grails.
GrailsTaskClassProperty Holds properties names from GrailsTaskClass
 

Class Summary
CronTriggerFactoryBean Factory bean which configures CronTrigger.
DefaultGrailsTaskClass Grails artefact class which represents a Quartz job.
GrailsJobFactory Job factory which retrieves Job instances from ApplicationContext.
JobDetailFactoryBean Simplified version of Spring's MethodInvokingJobDetailFactoryBean that avoids issues with non-serializable classes (for JDBC storage).
SimpleTriggerFactoryBean Factory bean which configures SimpleTrigger.
TaskArtefactHandler Grails artefact handler for task classes.
